title: Return of the Quadzilla (Realistic Edition)
notes: Full-body comeback with clear Apple Watch modes at the right time. KB max 45 lbs, DBs max 50 lbs.

items: [Apple Watch] Set to 'Indoor Walk' mode for the warmup
5-min incline walk or jog @ brisk pace

blocks.name: Strength Reboot (Lower Pull + Push)
blocks.instructions: Focus on controlled tempo and clean reps. [Apple Watch] Switch to 'Functional Strength Training' before beginning this block.

blocks.name: Upper Pull + Core Stability
blocks.instructions: Superset: Pull-Ups + Hanging Knee Raises. [Apple Watch] Keep on 'Functional Strength Training' mode.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.notes: add band or weight as needed

blocks.name: The Sweat Protocol
blocks.instructions: EMOM 18 (Every Minute on the Minute): Rotate 3 stations, six total rounds. [Apple Watch] Switch to 'HIIT' mode before starting this condition

blocks.name: Optional Finisher
blocks.instructions: 3 rounds: 30-sec Farmer Carry (50 lb DBs) + 15 Sit-ups + 30-sec Plank. [Apple Watch] switch back to 'Functional Strength Training'.
